prompt.content:

No chance (0%)
Little chance  (20%)
Less than even (40%)
Fairly possible (60%)
Very good chance (80%)
Almost certain (100%)

Give ONLY your confidence phrase, no other words or explanation. For example:

Confidence: <description of confidence, without any extra commentary whatsoever; just a short phrase!>
